examples.example: 今天的天空多云，给人一种很舒适的感觉。

translate.english: Today's sky is cloudy, giving people a very comfortable feeling.

examples.example: 明天虽然是多云的天气，但丝毫不会影响我们出去游玩的好心情。

translate.english: Although it will be cloudy tomorrow, it will not affect our good mood to go out and play at all.

examples.example: 即使天空多云，也阻挡不了我们享受户外美好时光的热情。

translate.english: Even if the sky is cloudy, it can't stop our enthusiasm for enjoying the wonderful outdoor time.
